constantValues: A person record is one associated with a patron of the bank.

members.name: birthDate

constantValues: The person’s date of birth as per the identification document.

members.description: The person’s date of birth as per the identification document.

members.name: customerTypeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'customerTypeCode_display' is added to the 'Contact' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'customerTypeCode'
arguments.name: customerTypeCode_display

constantValues: Type of person’s relationship with the bank. This field must be set by the system through different processes such as customer enrollment, data migration, or complaints and opportunity capture.

members.description: Type of person’s relationship with the bank. This field must be set by the system through different processes such as customer enrollment, data migration, or complaints and opportunity capture.

members.name: billPay

constantValues: Flag indicating whether the person’s has bill pay enabled

members.description: Flag indicating whether the person’s has bill pay enabled

members.name: chargeStartDate

constantValues: The date from which charges must apply to the customer.

members.description: The date from which charges must apply to the customer.

members.name: churnScore

constantValues: The person’s probability of churn (i.e. probability that the customer will leave the bank) as calculated in relevant back-end systems and analytical engines.

members.description: The person’s probability of churn (i.e. probability that the customer will leave the bank) as calculated in relevant back-end systems and analytical engines.

members.name: creditScore

constantValues: Latest Credit Score run against the customer

members.description: Latest Credit Score run against the customer

members.name: debtBurdenRatio

constantValues: Debt Burden Ratio (%) of the person based on the person’s monthly income and liabilities.

members.description: Debt Burden Ratio (%) of the person based on the person’s monthly income and liabilities.

value.name: defaultChargeAccountId

constantValues: Default account of the customer to be charged for different transaction fees and service charges that apply to the person based on service requests and transactions requested and carried out in branch

value.description: Default account of the customer to be charged for different transaction fees and service charges that apply to the person based on service requests and transactions requested and carried out in branch

members.name: delinquencyScore

constantValues: The bucket number in which customer falls according to his total overdue amount and past due days.

members.description: The bucket number in which customer falls according to his total overdue amount and past due days.

members.name: delinquentAmount

constantValues: Total amount of payments that is overdue against the person’s existing loans and credit cards, for which he has become delinquent.

members.description: Total amount of payments that is overdue against the person’s existing loans and credit cards, for which he has become delinquent.

members.name: delinquentAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Delinquent Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Delinquent Amount in base currency.

members.name: directDeposit

constantValues: Flag indicating whether the person’s salary is transferred to this bank or not.

members.description: Flag indicating whether the person’s salary is transferred to this bank or not.

value.name: employerId

constantValues: The company at which the person works.

value.description: The company at which the person works.

members.name: employmentStatus

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'employmentStatus_display' is added to the 'Contact' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'employmentStatus'
arguments.name: employmentStatus_display

constantValues: The status of person’s employment such as salaried or self-employed.

members.description: The status of person’s employment such as salaried or self-employed.

value.name: enrollmentBranchId

constantValues: The branch at which the customer was enrolled.

value.description: The branch at which the customer was enrolled.

members.name: IDExpiryDate

constantValues: The date of expiry of the identification document provided by the person.

members.description: The date of expiry of the identification document provided by the person.

members.name: IDType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'IDType_display' is added to the 'Contact' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'IDType'
arguments.name: IDType_display

constantValues: The type of identification document that the prospect has provided to the bank such as passport or national ID card in case of Retail prospect, or the trade license or registration certificate, in cas

members.description: The type of identification document that the prospect has provided to the bank such as passport or national ID card in case of Retail prospect, or the trade license or registration certificate, in cas

members.name: isMinor

constantValues: Indication of whether the person is Minor.

members.description: Indication of whether the person is Minor.

members.name: monthlyIncome
members.description: The person’s  income per month.

members.name: monthlyIncomeBase

constantValues: Value of the Monthly Income in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Monthly Income in base currency.

members.name: monthlyLiabilities

constantValues: Monthly Liabilities of the customer including loan payments and other monthly liabilities.

members.description: Monthly Liabilities of the customer including loan payments and other monthly liabilities.

members.name: monthlyLiabilitiesBase

constantValues: Value of the Monthly Liabilities in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Monthly Liabilities in base currency.

members.name: placeOfBirth

constantValues: The person’s place of birth as per the identification document.

members.description: The person’s place of birth as per the identification document.

value.name: preferredBranchId

constantValues: The branch which the customer prefers to deal with.

value.description: The branch which the customer prefers to deal with.

members.name: profitTier

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'profitTier_display' is added to the 'Contact' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'profitTier'
arguments.name: profitTier_display

constantValues: Internal ranking of the retail customer based on profitability to the bank

members.description: Internal ranking of the retail customer based on profitability to the bank

members.name: residencyStatus

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'residencyStatus_display' is added to the 'Contact' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'residencyStatus'
arguments.name: residencyStatus_display

constantValues: The person’s status of residency in the country where he/she has a relationship with the bank.

members.description: The person’s status of residency in the country where he/she has a relationship with the bank.

members.name: residentInCountrySince

constantValues: Date from which the person has been resident of the country (if the person not a citizen and is a resident in the country where he/she has a relationship with the bank).

members.description: Date from which the person has been resident of the country (if the person not a citizen and is a resident in the country where he/she has a relationship with the bank).

members.name: totalDeposits

constantValues: The total amount of Assets Under Management for the person with the bank as of now (total deposits and investments that the customer has with the bank).

members.description: The total amount of Assets Under Management for the person with the bank as of now (total deposits and investments that the customer has with the bank).

members.name: totalDepositsBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Deposits in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Deposits in base currency.

members.name: totalLoans

constantValues: The total amount of Risks Under Management for the person with the bank as of now (total outstanding amount of loans and credit cards).

members.description: The total amount of Risks Under Management for the person with the bank as of now (total outstanding amount of loans and credit cards).

members.name: totalLoansBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Loans in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Loans in base currency.

members.name: visaExpiry

constantValues: The expiry date of the person’s residence permit in the country where he/she has a relationship with the bank.

members.description: The expiry date of the person’s residence permit in the country where he/she has a relationship with the bank.

members.name: waiveCharges

constantValues: Indication of whether the charges against different services and transactions must be waived for the customer. Charge waiver flag would be set to Yes for specific customers by the bank based on custom

members.description: Indication of whether the charges against different services and transactions must be waived for the customer. Charge waiver flag would be set to Yes for specific customers by the bank based on custom

definitions.description: A person record is one associated with a patron of the bank.
